extensionDescription.message: Removes gender stars and similar constructions that disturb the flow of reading, and replaces them with something else. Currently, only German constructions are handled.

labelNeutralArticlePronouns.message: Replace articles and pronouns with neutral alternatives
labelNeutralArticlePronouns.description: Setting description for article and pronoun substitution

labelBinnenI.message:
Replace detected Binnen-Is
(might erroneously also modify words like "SignIn", "getInput", or "Bundes-Innenminister")
labelBinnenI.description: Setting description for whether to replace Binnen-I

noteSave.message: Note: to apply changed options to already open web pages, you need to reload them.

headerGerman.description: Header for the german settings section.
